entities.name: crystal gazing
entities.description: Crystal gazing is described as a 'particularly refined art' by the speaker. It involves practicing relaxing the conscious mind and external eyes to clear the Inner Eye and superconscious.

entities.name: orb
entities.description: The Orb is mentioned as something that one peers into, described as having 'infinite depths'.

entities.name: inner eye
entities.description: The Inner Eye is mentioned as something that needs to be cleared in order to see. It is described as being connected to the superconscious.

entities.name: superconscious
entities.description: The superconscious is mentioned as being connected to the Inner Eye and needing to be cleared in order to see.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as someone who is trying to stifle his laughter while participating in crystal gazing. He points out a burn on the table and says it's from someone spilling their candle.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who keeps tutting while participating in crystal gazing.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as feeling foolish while participating in crystal gazing, trying to keep his mind empty and staring blankly at the crystal ball.
